"ディランダールの水晶片の調達":
"I know I've said this before, but
presentation is just as important as the
food itself. It doesn't matter how well
prepared the food is, if it doesn't look
appetizing, no one will eat it. Would you
bring me some dirandal shards? The
crystals of their bodies is absolutely
gorgeous. I just know I can wow the
people with the dishes I could make!
※ Cae de Nv.50+ Dirandals."
